radiographic_examinations.findings: A chest tube remains in place within the right pleural space; bibasilar atelectasis remains, s/p right lower lobectomy and empyemectomy; small loculated right hydropneumothorax, improved compared with prior; stable hypodensity within the posterior spleen likely representing a hemangioma or cyst; kidneys demonstrate symmetric contrast enhancement; dilated appendix to 7.8cm with normal tip containing gas; no periappendiceal stranding or fluid, and no enlarged lymph nodes.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Small loculated right hydropneumothorax improved compared with prior.
